abstract: Markit reports United States manufacturing purchasing managers' index for September remained at 53; reports private business growth in Europe slowed in September.
lead_paragraph: Growth in the manufacturing sector in the United States showed no month-over-month change in September, according to the financial data company Markit.

headline.main: Growth Slows in United States and Europe, Reports Show
headline.print_headline: Reports Show Growth Slowing in U.S. and Europe

snippet: Growth in the manufacturing sector in the United States showed no month-over-month change in September, according to the financial data company Markit.
